channel.title: ExoClient - A RSC client loader
channel.description:
I made this out of boredom today, it's a basic external client to rsc. Source included, i will add world hopping later on..
[url=http://uppit.com/dxbu4ld30ji9/ExoClient.zip]ExoClient[/url]
p.s. the code is messy... don't judge me on it, i havn't prettied it up yet.
